thread.title: Jamie Oliver’s wife Jools opens up on the heartbreak of her miscarriage as she hints another Baby Oliver is on the way
thread.title_full: Jamie Oliver’s wife Jools opens up on the heartbreak of her miscarriage as she hints another Baby Oliver is on the way

author: ballcock
title: Jamie Oliver’s wife Jools opens up on the heartbreak of her miscarriage as she hints another Baby Oliver is on the way
text:
TV Magazine 'IT'S IMPOSSIBLE TO ENJOY PREGNANCY' Jamie Oliver’s wife Jools opens up on the heartbreak of her miscarriage as she hints another Baby Oliver is on the way 
The pair are proud parents of five, with little son River born last August By BETH ALLCOCK, Showbiz Reporter 9th February 2017, 7:26 am Click to share on Facebook (Opens in new window) Comments JAMIE Oliver’s wife Jools has revealed the heartbreak of suffering a miscarriage during the early stages of a pregnancy. 
The yummy mummy – a parent of five with the superstar chef – gave birth to her youngest, son River, last year, and has revealed Baby Number six could soon be on the way. A photo posted by Jamie Oliver (@jamieoliver) on Jan 29, 2017 at 2:42am PST 
She has now bravely opened up on her miscarriage ordeal and its impact on her enjoyment of carrying a child. 
She told MailOnline: “I had a miscarriage at three months, which makes you so worried once you are pregnant again – it makes it impossible to enjoy the early stages of pregnancy.” 
The pair are proud parents to Petal Blossom, seven, Poppy Honey, 14, Daisy Boo, 13, and Buddy Bear, six, as well as River. PA:Press Association Wire Jools and Jamie are proud parents of five – and baby number six could be on the way Instagram Little River was born in August 2016 
Talking of expanding her brood in the future, she added: “I never really draw the line. 
“River’s six months now, so we’re past the really difficult sleepless first few months. 
“He’s such a joy. 
“I’m getting older but I’d definitely do it again if I could. I think Jamie’s finished but you just never know.” PA:Press Association She bravely said the impact of the miscarriage meant she didn’t enjoy the early stages of pregnancy 
Jools, 42, did not reveal when the pair’s tragic loss happened. 
Yet it is known she has faced a battle to get pregnant after being diagnosed with polycystic ovary syndrome while a teenager. related stories BABY’S BIG NIGHT OUT Peter Andre took his three-month-old son Theo on his first night out to Gino D'Acampo’s restaurant launch in Leeds 'love is a bargain bucket' Martin Lewis has GMB fans in stitches claiming fried chicken is perfect Valentines Day dinner WALFORD TO MARS Danny Dyer to quit EastEnders for Doctor Who? Soap star admits he wants the role as fans begin campaign for cockney Time Lord Model behaviour Adriana Lima flashes some sideboob while Alessandra Ambrosio's endless legs are also on display at New York charity gala LOVE IN THE AIR Naughty Nigel Havers confesses to mile-high club romps with all three of his wives 'an extraordinary person' Fame Academy's Carrie Grant reveals Tara Palmer-Tomkinson winning the show was the 'best night' of her life FATHER TO FATHER Jeremy McConnell claims Stephanie Davis' dad warned him of her 'emotional blackmail' JACKO'S FINANCIAL CRISIS Michael Jackson's estate in £800 million tax battle due to star's uncontrollable spending habit 'IT'S ALL GOOD TV' Holly Willoughby appears to suggest Kim Woodburn's fight with Phillip Schofield was 'faked' love the way you fly Rihanna stuns in gold as she channels Amelia Earhart for Harper's Bazaar mag SHEER JOY Khloe Kardashian poses in see-through lingerie with heart emojis covering her essentials Rolling in itch Ex-Top Gear host James May sells Rolls Royce as he's allergic to its leather seats Getty Images Little River is the latest addition to the Oliver family Jools’ wholesome veg & bean soup 
Jools and Jamie welcomed their fifth child in early August , with the cook, 41, sharing a snap of River wrapped up in a blanket sleeping on social media soon after. 
He wrote: "And then this just happened guys !! IT’S A BABY BOY !! 
"Everyone in the Oliver family is very surprised and beyond happy. He arrived safely, mum / @joolsoliver was really really amazing, unbelievably composed, natural birth and my two eldest Girls got to come in at the very end as the baby was born which was amazing to witness very very emotional. 
“8lbs ( that’s 16 packs of butter for you bakers out there) anyway we’re all hitting the hay it’s been a long day big love… bless a little baby boy Woop Woop !!!!"
